description: Integrate with Kibela to search and fetch notes seamlessly.

tools.name: kibela_get_my_notes
tools.description: Get my latest notes from Kibela

limit.description: Maximum number of notes to fetch

tools.name: kibela_get_note_content
tools.description: Get note content by note ID

tools.name: kibela_get_note_from_path
tools.description: Get note content by note path

tools.name: kibela_update_note_content
tools.description: Update note content by note id. This tool allows you to modify the content of an existing Kibela note. Before updating, it fetches the current content of the note to ensure proper version control. Note that you need the note ID (not the note path) to use this tool.

id.description: Note id - not note path (e.g. /notes/123). If you want to update note content by note path, please use kibela_get_note_from_path tool first and get note id from the response

content.description: New content of the note in markdown format. The content will completely replace the existing note content. Make sure to include all necessary formatting, headers, and sections you want to preserve.

tools.name: kibela_create_note
tools.description: Create a new note in Kibela.

draft.description: Whether to create the note as a draft

content.description: required: Content of the note in markdown format

folders.description: IDs of the folders to add the note to.

authorId.description: ID of the author of the note. If not specified, the note will be created by the authenticated user.

groupIds.description: required: IDs of the groups to create the note in.

coediting.description: required: Whether to enable co-editing for the note
